title: Name Removed is a troll player
body:
This player _Name Removed_ is a troll.

Things that he does include:

* deliberately feeding

* randomly pinging across the whole page (really annoying and interrupts communication between legit players)

I notice the was another account _Name Removed_, I'm speculating, but could be related.

Please perma ban this guy!!

Anyone who gets into a game with this player should quit, or be prepared for a really bad game.

replies.body:
Reporting Other Players

Please don't name names. If you see or hear about another person breaking the rules, send us a ticket directly so we can investigate and take action if necessary. We know that players report publicly with the best intentions, but it often leads to a witchhunt, rarely resulting in a positive discussion. We'll be taking action against players who have violated rules, so please report these players correctly.

Moderators will be looking for the following:

Posts that accuse others of being toxic players in-game
Posts accusing others of malicious activity
Posts that accuse others of cheating or using illegal services
Posts accusing others of trolling in the boards (there’s a report button for that)

I've reported this player multiple times and have been in a match with them a lot over the last few days.

There's nothing we can do short of dodging and that ends up punishing innocent players who are just avoiding the troll.

There's got to be something Riot can implement to help with this.

There is no "type" when I try to open a ticket for this kind of thing??

Any ideas how I can?

I have screenshots that I can send as well.

This particular account is an annoyance to many. I have encountered them several times.
dont bother sending a ticket they wont do anything

Its a player that trolls on every server (check reddit for more). I had a post about him 2 months ago but the moderators deleted it and I can't be bothered digging up the old thread and reposting. The only thing you can do is report and wait for 2 weeks until his new account comes out.

If I remember correctly, some bronze and silvers were actually [LOSING to one of this guy's accounts](http://imgur.com/a/4sWzH) in ranked games because they don't understand how the game works or how to win at it.
Does anyone know how to insert images. I have screenshots of the pinging behavior.
